pageContext.claim: “Every family in Minnesota needs to know about Sleepy Joe Biden's extreme plan to flood your state with an influx of refugees from Somalia, from other places, all over the planet.”
pageContext.analysis: This is racial scaremongering. Why would Trump single out the African nation of Somalia in these remarks? Biden has proposed to reverse Trump's draconian restrictions on refugee admissions. He's not proposing plans that say which immigrants go to which states.
